footer.text: Bridgeport Hotels is a division of GoTestRBLX

fields.name: 1. No Harassment
fields.value: GoTestRBLX is a place of friendly discussion & sharing. We do not allow any kind of harassment, bullying, put downs, use of racial & religious slurs, language that attacks a group(s) or individuals, creepy & sexual comments. You are expected to be respectful to everyone at all times.

fields.name: 2. No NSFW content
fields.value: This extends beyond things like nudity and sexual content. This includes urine, puke, and any kind of human/animal feces. Any content considered NSFW will be immediately deleted.

fields.name: 3. No Inappropriate Jokes
fields.value: Inappropriate jokes about anything including (but not limited to): Suicide, self-harm, anything mentioned above or below. This includes wishing some dead/telling someone to kill themselves

fields.name: 4. Do not abuse pings
fields.value: This includes pinging without reason, spam pinging, mass pinging, and ghost pinging (deleting the message). One ping is enough to get someone's attention, any more than that is annoying

fields.name: 5. Keep content in the correct channel
fields.value: This is simple, anything that is off topic goes in #off-topic Bot commands in #bots etc. If your message is sent in the wrong channel, it will be deleted, followed by a warning

fields.name: 6. Do NOT Complain about disciplinary actions taken against you
fields.value:
If you disagree with a punishment, appeal it to a staff member in DMs.

 Complaining/Whining about punishments publicly , calling 'admin abuse', or anything insulting a staff member is disrespectful and will result in further punishments against you.

fields.name: 7. Do not spam
fields.value: Don't spam the chat, speak in a language other than English, send copypasta's, send images/use emoji's that may mentally harm other users. All of this will be deleted and punished accordingly

fields.name: 8. Absolutly NO Drama
fields.value: Heated arguments or drama between memebers or staff of any kind will result in an immediate mute, and depending on the situation, further action may be taken

fields.name: Server Moderators have the right to punish users for the safety of the server and other users
